casebody.data:
No. 10-5532. Jesse F. Reece, Sr., Petitioner v. Countrywide Home Loans, et al. 562 U.S. 1196, 131 S. Ct. 1041,

178 L. Ed. 2d 860,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 676. January 18, 2011.

Motion for leave to file a petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 927, 131 S. Ct. 314, 178 L. Ed. 2d 205, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 7192.
